notification.auth.confirm_email.mail.lin: To confirm your account and verify your email address, please click the following button:

If you`ve received this mail in error, it`s likely that another user entered your email address while trying to create an account for a different email address. If you don`t click the link, the account won`t be activated.
If you have any questions about the service, feel free to contact us anytime at :email.
views.home.sub_header_0: Evaluation, Demo, Trialware, Functional-limited demo version, Time Limited Evaluation
views.home.content_0: This licensing model is useful in case you want to distribute secure trial or demo version of your product. Trial licenses are granted for a short time and allow customers to try the product before buying it. Usually, production-level work is not allowed and some features may be limited or disabled in demo mode. The product is completely disabled after trial license has expired, unless full-featured license is granted.
views.home.content_1: Subscription licensing model allows user to enable product for a specific period of time, with the possibility of the subscription renewal. Different subscription periods can be offered each with its own price. Support for auto-renewal with recurring payment is planned.
